articles.author: TN Sports Desk
articles.title: How much did Kapil Dev and 1983 World Cup winning Indian team charge for Ranveer Singh's movie '83'? - Times Now
articles.description: The members of the Indian cricket team that had won the 1983 World Cup reportedly charged a total of INR 15 crore from the makers of '83' the movie. Kapil Dev took the lion's share by charging INR 5 crore.
articles.content:
• 83, the movie is about to be released in Cinemas across India on December 24
  • The movie is based on the Indian cricket team's triumph in the 1983 World Cup
